description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

WhatsApp widget that allows you to display a widget at the bottom of your page and the ability for users to send a whatsapp message to your number.

UPD 03.09.24 Since version 1.4.0 plugin works on Safari browser and on mobile devices.
